ProductInfo.Features:
Use the standard H.264 video compression format stream lower,high quality,longer recording time, taking up less bandwidth resources
Super strong processing capacity: can realize 8CH D1 recording .
1/2.5" super low illumination Aptina Sensor Made in USA 700 TVL CCD Cameras
Completely new graphics operating interface design, to  let you experience easily and conveniently.
SDVR  combines the functions of DVR/HVR/NVR together, multi-mode input( support pure analog input, support analog +  network HD video input, support pure network HD video input). No need to worry  how to be compatible with analog system, to choose DVR or HVR, just one SDVR  can work.
ProductInfo.Name: Evertech 8 Channel Surveillance Security H.264 Multi-functional CCTV DVR Camera System with 8 Dome 700 TVL 2.8mm Lens CCD Cameras-1TB HDD-LCD Monitor
